thread.title: 9 movie futures we can now get ready for after Back To The Future became our past
thread.title_full: 9 movie futures we can now get ready for after Back To The Future became our past

title: 9 movie futures we can now get ready for after Back To The Future became our past
text:
9 movie futures we can now get ready for after Back To The Future became our past 9 movie futures we can now get ready for after Back To The Future became our past 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
The future we were able to lovingly explore in Back To The Future may now be in the past, but there’s other #futuredays we’ll soon be celebrating and mocking in equal measure. 
Here we list some of the upcoming highlights, with a trailer to whet your appetite for some alternative futures, even if they don’t have hoverboards. Our favourite is #6. 1. Rollerball, 2018 3. V For Vendetta, 2020/21 4. Her, 2025 5. Children Of Men, 2027 6. Terminator, 2029 8. Twelve Monkeys, 2035 9. I, Robot, 2035 
After that we’ve got the futures of Minority Report (2054), Looper (2074) and Total Recall, (2084) to get stuck into. Share article 
Plus there’s a hosts of futures we’ve already passed through from Holywoodland. Will Smith was roaming around a descolate NYC in the 2007 film I Am Legend – but that was set in 2012. *So* old. Promoted Stories
